name: whisper-transcribe
description: OpenAI Whisper speech-to-text transcription skill. Transcribe audio, translate to English, detect language, and list supported models and formats. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: whisper_transcribe
toolDefinition.description: Transcribe audio to text, translate audio to English, detect audio language, and list supported models and response formats using OpenAI Whisper. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access (BYOK).

action.description: transcribe (audio to text), translate (audio to English), detect_language (identify audio language), list_models (list available models), list_formats (list response formats)

file.description: Audio file URL or path. Required for transcribe, translate, and detect_language actions.

model.description: Model to use for transcription (default: whisper-1).

language.description: ISO 639-1 two-letter language code (e.g. en, fr, de). Optional for transcribe.

prompt.description: Optional context hint for transcription (max 500 characters).
